title: Mother's Love
description: They gave us life, they nurtured us in their wombs, and they naturally know what is best for us. Mother used to quote Agatha Christie: “A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.” I shivered every time she told me so, but I felt reassured and protected as I knew that all which stood in our path would be crushed down.
author: Massimo Marino
